entry.title: First Solana ETP in North America On The Horizon: Details
entry.summary:
On Thursday, 3iQ Digital Asset Management announced the filing of a preliminary prospectus for The Solana Fund (QSOL) with securities regulatory authorities across Canada, excluding Quebec. If approved, QSOL will become the first Solana (SOL) exchange-traded product (ETP) listed in North America, trading on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX) under the ticker ‚ÄúQSOL‚Äù.
First Solana ETP In North America Submitted
This prospective listing marks a significant milestone for 3iQ, a global leader in digital asset investment solutions. The firm has a robust history of firsts in the digital asset sector, including launching the first publicly traded Bitcoin and Ether funds in Canada.
QSOL aims to offer investors exposure to the digital currency SOL, the daily price movements of SOL in US dollars,‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin Net Taker Volume Remains Negative: What It Means
entry.summary:
Data shows the Bitcoin Net Taker Volume has been mostly at negative levels recently. Here‚Äôs what this could mean for the asset‚Äôs price.
Bitcoin Net Taker Volume Has Been Mostly Negative In The Past Month
As CryptoQuant community manager Maartunn pointed out in a post on X, the Net Taker Volume suggests a lack of strong taker buy volume in the past month.
The ‚ÄúNet Taker Volume‚Äù is an indicator that keeps track of the difference between the Bitcoin taker buy and taker sell volumes. Naturally, the two volumes measure the buy and sell orders filled by takers in perpetual swaps.
When the value of this metric is positive, it means that the taker buy volume is greater than the taker sell volume right now. Such a trend implies the majority of the market shares a bullish sentiment.
On t‚Ä¶

Arrests Made In Billion-Pound Crypto Laundering Bust

entry.title: Ripple Case May End Without SEC Appeal, Ex-Official Suggests
entry.summary:
The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) may opt not to appeal the summary judgment ruling from Judge Analisa Torres partially favoring Ripple Labs, signaling a strategic shift to avoid establishing a potentially unfavorable precedent in higher courts. This possibility has come to light as the crypto community awaits the court‚Äôs remedies phase ruling expected by the end of Summer 2024, after which the SEC‚Äôs window to appeal will open.
Why The SEC May Want To Avoid An Appeal Vs. Ripple
Kristina Littman, former head of the SEC‚Äôs Enforcement‚Äôs Cyber Unit, weighed in on the SEC‚Äôs potential course of action during a recent conference on digital assets. She speculated that given the mixed judicial opinions in similar cases, the SEC might choose to accept the district court‚Äôs decision.
‚Ä¶

entry.title: ‚ÄòMore Bullish Than Ever‚Äô: Circle CEO Explains Why He‚Äôs Optimistic About Crypto

Circle‚Äôs co-founder and Chief Executive Officer said he is exceptionally optimistic about crypto‚Äôs future. In an X post, the CEO noted why he‚Äôs ‚Äúmore bullish than ever before‚Äù on the industry.
Why Is Circle CEO Bullish On Crypto?
On Wednesday, Jeremy Allaire shared the reasons behind his increasing optimism with his X followers. This perspective was based on the CEO‚Äôs 35-year career. During this time, he has watched the waves of innovation and technology adoption transform several industries and improve utility for people.
As he entered the industry, Allaire considered that crypto was ‚Äúthe next logical layer of infrastructure for the internet.‚Äù 11 years later, ‚Äúcrypto seems like it‚Äôs on the cusp of catapulting society and the economy forward in tremendously powerful new ways.‚Äù‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Invasion: VanEck‚Äôs Australian Launch Sparks Crypto Craze
entry.summary:
Bitcoin‚Äôs growing adoption among institutional and retail investors has now extended to Australia, with the debut of the VanEck Bitcoin ETF on the country‚Äôs main stock exchange.¬†
Asia-Pacific Poised For Crypto ETF Boom?¬†
Following similar products approved in the United States and Hong Kong earlier this year, the VanEck Bitcoin ETF commenced trading on the exchange operated by the Australia Stock Exchange (ASX) with a seed investment of approximately A$985,000 ($657,000).
The VanEck Bitcoin ETF launch in Australia is accompanied by the preparations of other players, such as BetaShares Holdings Pty and DigitalX, who plan to list their crypto ETFs on the main Australian board. While VanEck has received approval, the ASX confirms ongoing engagement with other issuers.¬†

entry.title: Marathon Uses Bitcoin Mining To Heat Town of 11,000 in Finland
entry.summary:
Today, Marathon Digital Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: MARA), a leader in Bitcoin mining, has launched an innovative pilot project to recycle heat generated from Bitcoin mining to warm a community in Finland. The 2-megawatt data center, energized at the end of May, is located in the Satakunta region, home to 11,000 residents.
JUST IN: Marathon is now warming a town of over 11,000 in Finland using heat from #Bitcoin mining ü§Ø üá´üáÆ pic.twitter.com/BUEzj7zqOi ‚Äî Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) June 20, 2024

entry.title: Winklevoss Twins Donate $2 Million in Bitcoin to Donald Trump

Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss, co-founders of cryptocurrency exchange Gemini, have donated 30.94 Bitcoin, valued at over $2 million, to former President Donald Trump's campaign. Both Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss announced on their X accounts that they contributed 15.47 BTC ($1 million) each to Trump to "put an end to the Biden Administration's war on crypto," Cameron stated, stemming¬†from the twins' discontent with the Biden Administration's stance on cryptocurrency regulation.

entry.title: Webinar: Unleashing The Power Of Permissionless Markets With Vega Protocol
entry.summary: Join our expert panel for an insightful discussion on Vega Protocol's revolutionary approach to decentralized derivatives trading. Discover how Vega's permissionless markets enable anyone to create and trade futures and perpetuals on a fully decentralized network. Explore the potential of Vega's innovative features, such as the ability to add new assets, transfer network assets, and adjust network parameters‚Äîas well as the protocol's active markets.
